name: linksaver-monorepo
description: Monorepo scripts for LinkSaver (API, UI, Extension, CMS services)

scripts.cms:seed: npm --prefix cms-composer run seed:dev && npm --prefix cms-renderer run seed:dev
scripts.cms:reset: RESET=1 npm --prefix cms-composer run seed:reset && RESET=1 npm --prefix cms-renderer run seed:reset
scripts.cms:test: npm --prefix cms-sdk run test && npm --prefix cms-composer run test && npm --prefix cms-renderer run test && npm --prefix ui run test
scripts.cms:test:coverage: npm --prefix cms-sdk run test:coverage && npm --prefix cms-composer run test:coverage && npm --prefix cms-renderer run test:coverage && npm --prefix ui run test:coverage
